Description:
*Project Planning:* Collaborating with architects and project managers to understand project requirements and goals.
*Site Inspection:* Regularly visiting the construction site to ensure work is progressing according to plans and specifications.
*Quality Control:* Monitoring the quality of materials and workmanship to ensure they meet project standards.
*Safety Compliance:* Enforcing safety regulations and ensuring that workers and equipment operate safely.
*Progress Reporting:* Providing regular progress reports to project managers and stakeholders.
*Problem Solving:* Identifying and addressing construction-related issues, such as delays, design changes, or unexpected site conditions.
*Cost Management:* Tracking project expenses and helping to control costs within the budget.
*Resource Management:* Managing on-site resources, including labor, equipment, and materials.
*Documentation:* Keeping accurate records of site activities, changes, and incidents.
*Communication:* Serving as a liaison between different parties involved in the project, including contractors, subcontractors, and government authorities.
*Testing and Inspections:* Overseeing testing and inspections of materials and systems to ensure compliance with specifications.
*Environmental Compliance:* Ensuring that the project adheres to environmental regulations and standards.
*Scheduling:* Developing and maintaining project schedules to meet deadlines.
*Problem Resolution:* Resolving disputes and conflicts that may arise on the construction site.
*Coordination:* Coordinating the work of various trades and contractors to ensure a smooth construction process.
*Design Changes:* Managing and implementing design changes as required during construction.
*Client Relations:* Maintaining positive relationships with clients and addressing their concerns.
*Final Inspection:* Conducting a final inspection to ensure that all work is completed correctly before project handover.Skills
Skills:
Previous experience as a site engineer or similar role
Well-versed in technical aspects of field projects, including machinery and equipment
Understanding of safety guidelines
Attention to detail
Project management skills
Communication skills
Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or similar field
